history.narrative: Law 5-83 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-220, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 28, 1984, and March 13, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 29, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-119 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
